downloadTitle: Netezza to SQL - Schema Converter Utility
downloadDescription: Netezza DDL converter utility is an application that can convert Netezza database schema DDL to SQL equivalent.
detailsSection: The Netezza DDL converter utility is an application that can convert Netezza database schema DDL to SQL equivalent. The application is a Windows console-based utility and currently supports conversion of table schema, views, stored procedures, synonyms, defaults and constraints. For Azure Synapse targets, the application with keep table distributions (moving them as appropriate) and you have the option of turning on External Table Creation.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a zipped folder that contains the tool and supporting documentation.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
